typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		EmployeeKey as string,
		ParentEmployeeKey as string,
		EmployeeNationalIDAlternateKey as string,
		ParentEmployeeNationalIDAlternateKey as string,
		SalesTerritoryKey as string,
		FirstName as string,
		LastName as string,
		MiddleName as string,
		NameStyle as string,
		Title as string,
		HireDate as string,
		BirthDate as string,
		LoginID as string,
		EmailAddress as string,
		Phone as string,
		MaritalStatus as string,
		EmergencyContactName as string,
		EmergencyContactPhone as string,
		SalariedFlag as string,
		Gender as string,
		PayFrequency as string,
		BaseRate as string,
		VacationHours as string,
		SickLeaveHours as string,
		CurrentFlag as string,
		SalesPersonFlag as string,
		DepartmentName as string,
		StartDate as string,
		EndDate as string,
		Status as string,
		abrevation as string,
		signification as string,
		fullname as string,
		Age as string,
		EmployeePhotoConverted as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	wildcardPaths:[' @item().name']) ~> source1
source1 derive(employeekeyInt = toInteger(EmployeeKey),
		parentemployeeint = toInteger(ParentEmployeeKey),
		salariedflagbit = toBoolean(SalariedFlag),
		birthdateConv = toTimestamp(BirthDate),
		HireDateConv = toTimestamp(HireDate),
		BaseRateConv = toFloat(BaseRate),
		SickLeaveHoursconv = toInteger(SickLeaveHours),
		payFreqConv = toInteger(PayFrequency),
		vacancyhoursConv = toInteger(VacationHours),
		startdateconv = toTimestamp(StartDate),
		endateconv = toTimestamp(EndDate),
		salesFlagConv = toBoolean(SalesPersonFlag),
		currentflagconv = toBoolean(CurrentFlag),
		filename = "filename") ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		EmployeeKey as integer,
		ParentEmployeeKey as integer,
		EmployeeNationalIDAlternateKey as string,
		ParentEmployeeNationalIDAlternateKey as string,
		SalesTerritoryKey as integer,
		FirstName as string,
		LastName as string,
		MiddleName as string,
		NameStyle as boolean,
		Title as string,
		HireDate as date,
		BirthDate as date,
		LoginID as string,
		EmailAddress as string,
		Phone as string,
		MaritalStatus as string,
		EmergencyContactName as string,
		EmergencyContactPhone as string,
		SalariedFlag as boolean,
		Gender as string,
		PayFrequency as integer,
		BaseRate as decimal(19,4),
		VacationHours as integer,
		SickLeaveHours as integer,
		CurrentFlag as boolean,
		SalesPersonFlag as boolean,
		DepartmentName as string,
		StartDate as date,
		EndDate as date,
		Status as string,
		filenamee as string
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	recreate:true,
	format: 'table',
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		EmployeeKey = employeekeyInt,
		ParentEmployeeKey = parentemployeeint,
		EmployeeNationalIDAlternateKey,
		ParentEmployeeNationalIDAlternateKey,
		SalesTerritoryKey = payFreqConv,
		FirstName,
		LastName,
		MiddleName,
		NameStyle = salariedflagbit,
		Title,
		HireDate = HireDateConv,
		BirthDate = birthdateConv,
		LoginID,
		EmailAddress,
		Phone,
		MaritalStatus,
		EmergencyContactName,
		EmergencyContactPhone,
		SalariedFlag = salariedflagbit,
		Gender,
		PayFrequency = payFreqConv,
		BaseRate = BaseRateConv,
		VacationHours = vacancyhoursConv,
		SickLeaveHours = SickLeaveHoursconv,
		CurrentFlag = currentflagconv,
		SalesPersonFlag = salesFlagConv,
		DepartmentName,
		StartDate = startdateconv,
		EndDate = endateconv,
		Status,
		filenamee = filename
	)) ~> sink1
